Name: Blood and Sand (Classic formula)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: One of the best classic Scotch cocktails, the Blood & Sand is said to be the Scotch whisky-based cocktail that whisky haters will like. Some may find this equal part's recipe a tad on the sweet side and if this is the case then our Blood & Sand recipe ups the Scotch notes with reduced sweet ingredients.
History: Created in 1922, this cocktail is named after Rudolph Valentino's Blood & Sand movie .
Nutrition: One serving of Blood and Sand (Classic formula) contains 174 calories
